subject: Speedskating
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Brittany Bowe of the United States set a world record in the women’s 1,000-meter race at the World Cup speedskating event in Salt Lake City. Bowe finished in 1 minute 12.18 seconds.
snippet: Brittany Bowe of the United States set a world record in the women’s 1,000-meter race at the World Cup speedskating event in Salt Lake City. Bowe finished in 1 minute 12.18 seconds.
